goal.en: 培養學生專題研究能力
goal.ch: 培養學生專題研究能力

content.en:
希望透過此課程，讓學生對高效能計算及所需相關之電腦硬軟體知識，有一全面性的了解，並經由課程中的上機練習部分，讓學生能實際動手做些簡單的平行/分散式計算，作為日後從事相關研究或更深入課程(如平行數值計算等)的修課基礎。
課程內容由什麼叫高效能計算開始，接著談到效能評估(Benchmark)，再由效能評估指出高效能計算的目前走向，課程主要內容由此依序展開。先從RISC Processor 講起，接著是Memory Hierarchy、Computer Network、parallel and Vector Computers、Performance and Scalability of Parallel System，最後再談到Parallel Programming以及Parallel and Vector Computing。目前最受矚目的個人電腦叢集系統(PC Cluster)亦包在此一課程內。

textbook.en:
“Kevin Dowd and Charles Severance(1998). High Performance Computing. 2nd Ed, O’Rielly ＆ Associates, Inc., California.
( A good introductory book for those who do not have background in this field.)
David E. Culler, Jaswinder Pal Singh and Anoop Gupta(1999), Parallel Computer Architecture：A Haraware/Software Approach, Morgan Kaufmann Publishers, Inc., San Francisco, California.
(A comprehensive and updated book on parallel computer architectire.)
Kai Huang and Zhiwei Xu (1998), Scalable Parallel Computing ：Technology, Architecture, Programming, WCB/McGraw-Hill.
(A good parallel computing book with cluster computing.)
Gregory F. Pfister (1997), In Search of Cluster：The Ongoing Battle in Lowly Parallel Computing, 2nd Ed., Prentice-Hall, Inc.“
